potions.name: Dashboard Layout with Collapsible Sidebar
potions.excerpt: A responsive admin dashboard layout with collapsible sidebar navigation and fixed header. Perfect for admin panels, SaaS applications, and data-driven interfaces.

potions.name: Modal Dialog (Accessible) with Focus Trap and Actions
potions.excerpt: An accessible modal dialog component with focus trapping, Escape/backdrop dismissal rules, scroll locking, and action footer. Includes confirm/alert variants and responsive fullscreen behavior on small screens.

potions.name: Navigation Bar (Responsive) with Mobile Menu
potions.excerpt: A responsive navigation bar component with mobile hamburger menu, sticky scroll behavior, and transparent-to-solid transition. Supports marketing (logo + links + CTA) and app (user menu, notifications) variants.

potions.name: 3-Tier SaaS Pricing Table with Monthly/Yearly Toggle
potions.excerpt: A responsive 3-tier pricing table component with monthly/yearly billing toggle, highlighted 'Most Popular' plan, and feature comparison. Perfect for SaaS marketing pages, product pages, and subscription-based services.

potions.name: Data Table (Sortable, Paginated, Filterable)
potions.excerpt: A comprehensive data table component with sorting, pagination, filtering, row selection, and responsive behavior. Includes loading, empty, and error states with full keyboard navigation support.

potions.name: Toast Notifications (Accessible) with Queue System
potions.excerpt: A non-blocking toast notification system with success/error/warning/info variants, queue management, auto-dismiss, keyboard navigation, and screen reader announcements. Perfect for user feedback after actions.

potions.name: Landing Page Layout (Marketing)
potions.excerpt: A conversion-optimized marketing landing page layout with hero section, feature highlights, social proof, and multiple CTAs. Perfect for product launches, SaaS marketing, and lead generation campaigns.

potions.name: ESLint Config Generator for UI Projects
potions.excerpt: A comprehensive ESLint configuration generator supporting React, Vue, Angular, and Svelte with accessibility linting, TypeScript support, and Prettier integration.

potions.name: Form Validation Pattern - UX and Timing Strategies
potions.excerpt: A comprehensive UX pattern for form validation covering timing strategies, error display, async validation, accessibility, and integration with form libraries.

potions.name: Text Input Field (Accessible) with Label, Error, and Success States
potions.excerpt: An accessible text input component with label, hint text, error display, success indicator, and comprehensive state management. Foundation for all form inputs.

potions.name: Login & Registration Forms with Validation
potions.excerpt: Complete authentication forms (login and registration) with real-time validation, error handling, password strength, and accessibility.
